## Jakaumat ja keskiarvot

```{r}
library(ggplot2
# Density plots with means
ggplot(df, aes(x=rating, colour=cond)) + geom_density() +
    geom_vline(data=cdf, aes(xintercept=rating.mean,  colour=cond),
               linetype="dashed", size=1)
```
